EmailTemplate.subject: This Month in Spring
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This Month in Spring April 2019 Hi, Spring fans! Welcome to another installment of This Month in Spring!
What a month it's been since we last talked! I've been to, among other places, Tel Aviv, Vienna, Amsterdam, Seattle, Montreal, and London. This week I'm in New York City for the Kafka Summit, where I'll be joining the legendary Tim Berglund <[[https://twitter.com/tlberglund]]>, Head of Developer Experience at Confluent, and James Watters <[[https://twitter.com/WattersJames]]>, SVP at Pivotal, to talk about why Pivotal (and Spring and Cloud Foundry) and Confluent (and Kafka and Kafka Streams) are better together. Then it's off to South Africa for the SpringOne Tour installments; Mauritius; Hangzhou, China; and then back to Los Angeles, among other places.
A particularly special note: Spring Framework was released on March 25, 2004! Happy 15th birthday, Spring!
The Long and short of it <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cloud-native-josh-long/this-month-in-spring-march-2019?utm_campaign=newsletter-spring-april-q119&utm_source=newsletter-email&utm_medium=email]]>
S1T Visits South Africa and Europe
In early April, the SpringOne Tour will make stops in Johannesburg and Cape Town before heading to Istanbul and Paris in late April and May. Visit our tour page <[[https://springonetour.io/?utm_campaign=newsletter-spring-april-q119&utm_source=newsletter-email&utm_medium=email]]> for more information on upcoming stops.
Get on board <[[https://springonetour.io/?utm_campaign=newsletter-spring-april-q119&utm_source=newsletter-email&utm_medium=email]]>
Spring Training and Certification
The Spring Professional Certification Exam is designed to test and validate your understanding of and familiarity with Spring. With Core Spring, Spring Boot and Spring Cloud training and certification, you can maximize your individual software proficiency or train your whole team in a modern approach!
Sign me up! <[[https://spring.io/services?utm_campaign=newsletter-spring-april-q119&utm_source=newsletter-email&utm_medium=email]]>
